sentences.en: "Is she supposed to work today?" — "Nope, tomorrow."
British Airways is putting on an extra flight to London tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 英国航空公司明天将增加一班到伦敦的航班。

sentences.en: Go to sleep. I've got a long day tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 睡觉吧。我明天还得忙呢。

sentences.en: He is leaving tomorrow to play his first match.
sentences.cn: 他明天将出发去参加他的首场比赛。

sentences.en: I ate as if there was no tomorrow.
I was going to give you a bell tomorrow.
I will be discussing the situation with colleagues tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 明天我会和同事们讨论一下情况。

sentences.en: I'd like to check him out of here the day after tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我想后天帮他办理手续，结账离开这里。

sentences.en: I'll ring the hotel. I'll tell them we'll check in tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我来给旅馆打电话，通知他们我们明天入住。

sentences.en: I’ll see you at tomorrow’s meeting.
Meet me down at the beach tomorrow, at 6am sharp.
sentences.cn: 明天早上6点整在海滩上跟我见面。

sentences.en: Our class is going to London tomorrow.
She says the kid's been squirrelling money away like there's no tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 她说这孩子一直在拼命存钱。

sentences.en: The players are in defiant mood as they prepare for tomorrow'sgame.
sentences.cn: 球员在备战明天的比赛时带着蔑视对手的情绪。

sentences.en: The Turkish situation makes the lead in tomorrow's Guardian.
sentences.cn: 土耳其局势将成为明天《卫报》的头条。

sentences.en: Tomorrow he would tell his pilot to get the aircraft ready.
sentences.cn: 明天他会告诉他的飞行员准备好飞机。

sentences.en: Tomorrow without fail he would be at the old riverside warehouse.
sentences.cn: 明天他一定会在河边的旧仓库里。

sentences.en: Well, we shall look forward to seeing him tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 嗯，我们期待着明天与他会面。

phrases.phrase: as if there was (或 as though there were) no tomorrow

phrases.tran_cn: 明天又是新的开始（不愉快经历之后所说的乐观话）
(英)从明天算起的一星期以后

trans.tran_en: on or during the day after today
on or during the day after today
